title: Sun in Leo
summary: A period that spotlights expression, celebration, and creative confidence. The atmosphere encourages visibility, play, and leading with heart.

meaning.headline: The environment rewards authenticity, courage to be seen, and generous spirit.

frames.text: With the Sun in Leo, the collective tone brightens toward creativity, performance, and recognition.
This season encourages showing what you care about and sharing it boldly.
Warmth and enthusiasm can rally people around a shared focus.
Playfulness helps restore energy and courage.

frictions: Taking feedback as a personal threat

do: Share a piece of work or progress publicly.
Lead with invitation rather than demand.
Express what you believe in clear, warm language.
avoid: Ignoring rest because inspiration feels high
Treating visibility as the only measure of worth

reusable_lines.text: This is a season to shine with heart and invite others to shine too.
Joy and courage are persuasive right now.

forbidden_claims: Identity claims about being a Leo
Deterministic statements about ego or pride
allowed_framing: Environmental focus on expression and warmth
Agency-based choices about visibility and generosity

sources: Sun in Leo as collective focus on expression and celebration
